attributes.action: admit he is guilty of Treason
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Under the Treason Act 1351, still a legal Act of Parliament today, adhering to enemies of the State and giving them aid or comfort is a treasonable offence.

We want the Prime Minister to make a statement to explain to the public why allowing 20 Taliban into Britain under the 'open door' immigration policy of this government does not constitute treason.

rejection.details: If you believe an offence has been committed please contact the police.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
